sentence: """वात्सल्यभाव: - भक्त: भगवन्त: स्वबालकवत पश्यन्ति, यथा यशोदा श्री कृष्णं पश्यति स्म । अस्मिन भावे भक्त: भगवत: सेवां करोति भोजनं कारयति भगवतं प्रति पश्यति यथा मता स्वबालकेन सह करोति ।"""
gold: """Vatsalya Bhava: The devotee looks upon God as his child. Yashoda had this Bhava with Lord Krishna. The devotee serves, feeds, and looks upon God as a mother does in the case of her child."""

llama-v3p1-405b-instruct: "Vatsalya Bhava: - Devotees see God as their own child, just as Yashoda saw Sri Krishna. In this sentiment, the devotee serves God, feeds Him, and looks at Him just as a mother does with her child."
gpt-4o-mini: "The attitude of affection - the devotee sees the Lord like a mother seeing her own child, just as Yashoda saw Shri Krishna. In this sentiment, the devotee performs service to the Lord and prepares food, seeing the Lord as one would do with one's own child."
llama-v3p1-8b-instruct: The devotees see the Lord as their own child, just as Yashoda sees Krishna. In this state, the devotee serves the Lord, prepares food for Him, and sees Him as their own child, just as a mother does.

sentence: """यूयं वाञ्छथ किन्तु नाप्नुथ, यूयं नरहत्याम् ईर्ष्याञ्च कुरुथ किन्तु कृतार्था भवितुं न शक्नुथ, यूयं युध्यथ रणं कुरुथ च किन्त्वप्राप्तास्तिष्ठथ, यतो हेतोः प्रार्थनां न कुरुथ।"""
gold: """Ye lust, and have not: ye kill, and desire to have, and cannot obtain: ye fight and war, yet ye have not, because ye ask not."""
gpt-4o: "You desire but do not attain, you commit murder and envy but cannot achieve success, you fight and wage war but do not obtain, because you do not pray."
llama-v3p1-405b-instruct: "You desire, but do not obtain; you commit murder and envy, but cannot achieve your goals; you fight and wage war, but do not gain; because you do not pray."
gpt-4o-mini: "You may desire, but you do not attain; you may engage in envy and murder, but you cannot become fulfilled; you may fight and engage in battle, but you stand without achieving, for you do not make a prayer."
llama-v3p1-8b-instruct: "You wish for something but do not get it, you wish to kill but do not get killed, you wish to fight but do not get hurt, you wish to conquer but do not get conquered. That is the nature of the world."

sentence: """अतएवाहं वदामि, ईश्वरेण यो नियमः पुरा ख्रीष्टमधि निरचायि ततः परं त्रिंशदधिकचतुःशतवत्सरेषु गतेषु स्थापिता व्यवस्था तं नियमं निरर्थकीकृत्य तदीयप्रतिज्ञा लोप्तुं न शक्नोति।"""
